title: The Reluctant Consort
description:
Duke Silver takes on Jihan Kamran who is determined to protect his big sister from an arranged marriage. A powerful emperor watches and waits for them to make a mistake so he can get his way.Jihan Jihan is the master of Kamran Estate. He runs a wealthy merchant network and is soon forced to supply a war by his villainous father. After the war with West Nation ends, Jihan's powerful network gains the Emperor's attention. The Emperor orders a member of the Kamran family must wed into the royal family so that he can gain control of Jihan's wealth.Kastan (Duke Silver)Duke Silver is the second prince in the Akasha Imperial Family. The Empress of Akasha is afraid of his immense military power. Kastan uncovers her plot to murder him and approaches the Emperor. The Emperor decides that Kastan's marriage to a Kamran will keep Jihan's family in check, and in turn, the vast Kamran wealth will protect Kastan from the Empress's jealousy.Will Kastan and Jihan understand each other in the end? Can they be one when so many are against them?
This is an #mmromance. The Reluctant Consort is a boy meets boy world.
author: Suilan Lee
